item.description:
I only have 2 weeks left to wear matching shoes ( surgery soon) and want to play in the woods. Join me at this great disc golf course. It's longer than the one in Pelham but still full of fun and challenges. It's only $5 to play. I will lend some of my discs and there are also free loaners. Bring water and a snack as there are no stores at this site.

Here is some info:http://www.dgcoursereview.com/reviews.php?id=4519&mode=rev

https://www.facebook.com/pages/Top-O-The-Hill-Disc-Golf/185615641474598?ref=ts

Marty has put down rubber t-off mats too.

So bring your energy, bug spray, water, good walking shoes, friends and fun attitudes and lets toss some discs. ( I don't care if you can't..it's just for fun)

My number..603-315-0275

Â 

Rain will cancel this event.
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet at the trailer off the parking lot
item.name: Disc Golf
